title: A superb experience.
text: Our visit was to celebrate our 40th wedding anniversary weekend. Throughout our stay the attention to detail was stunning, the staff were brilliant and the overall experience was second to none. Our stay was overseen by Izabela, who, in charge of guest experience, ensured everything was perfect. We have stayed in many hotels and I can confirm that the Montcalm is the best we have experienced. Outstanding!
